main event: Multiple witnesses observed three long green-iridescent objects resembling fireballs flying in a straight path before suddenly flaring out.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on August 10, 1958, 33 miles south of Arvada, Colorado.,The objects were described as fireballs or bolides with a duration lasting about 10-15 seconds.,Witnesses reported a sound associated with the flying objects.,The objects flew in a straight line and did not descend.,Project Blue Book concluded that there was insufficient data to classify the objects.
witness description: Civilian witness observed the objects from a residence.
